nodes.label: start
utterances: Welcome to our Travel Management service! How can I help you plan your trip today?

nodes.label: select_destination
utterances: Great! Where would you like to travel?
Which destination are you interested in?

nodes.label: flight_booking
utterances: Let's book your flights. What are your flight preferences?
Please provide your flight details.

nodes.label: hotel_booking
utterances: Time to book your hotel. What are your accommodation preferences?
Please provide your hotel preferences.

nodes.label: car_rental
utterances: Would you like to rent a car for your trip?
Please let me know your car rental preferences.

nodes.label: tour_selection
utterances: Would you like to book any tours or activities?
Please select the tours you're interested in.

nodes.label: review_itinerary
utterances: Let's review your itinerary. Do you want to make any changes?
Here is your planned itinerary. Would you like to confirm or modify it?

nodes.label: confirmation
utterances: Your itinerary looks good. Would you like to proceed with the booking?
Do you confirm the finalized itinerary?

nodes.label: payment
utterances: Please provide your payment details to complete the booking.
How would you like to make the payment?

nodes.label: exit
utterances: Thank you for using our Travel Management service. Have a great day!
If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Goodbye!

nodes.label: change_request
utterances: Sure, let's make the necessary changes. What would you like to modify?
Please specify the changes you want to make to your itinerary.

nodes.label: welcome
utterances: Welcome to our store! How can I assist you today?
Hello! Glad to have you here. What are you looking to purchase today?

nodes.label: category_select
utterances: Please select a product category that interests you.
Which category would you like to explore today?

nodes.label: product_detail
utterances: Here are the details of the product you selected.
Let me provide you with more information about this product.

nodes.label: custom_options
utterances: Would you like to customize this product?
You can personalize your product with the following options.

nodes.label: add_to_cart
utterances: The product has been added to your cart. Would you like to add more items?
I've added this to your cart. Do you want to continue shopping or proceed to checkout?

nodes.label: additional_items
utterances: Feel free to browse more products or let me know if you're ready to checkout.
You can add more items to your cart or move forward to complete your purchase.

nodes.label: apply_discounts
utterances: Do you have a discount code you'd like to apply?
Would you like to use any available discounts for your purchase?

nodes.label: shipping_options
utterances: Please choose your preferred shipping option.
Select a shipping method that suits your needs.

nodes.label: checkout_confirmation
utterances: Please confirm your order details before proceeding to payment.
Would you like to review and confirm your order?

nodes.label: payment_process
utterances: Let's proceed to the payment process. How would you like to pay?
Please select a payment method to complete your purchase.

nodes.label: order_complete
utterances: Thank you for your purchase! Your order has been successfully placed.
Your order is confirmed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

nodes.label: error_handling
utterances: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please clarify?
Oops! Something went wrong. Let me help you with that.

Feel free to browse additional items that might interest you.

nodes.label: intro
utterances: Hello! How can I assist you with your medical appointments today?

nodes.label: reason_for_visit
utterances: Sure, could you please provide the reason for your visit?

nodes.label: doctor_type
utterances: What type of doctor would you like to see?

nodes.label: schedule_options
utterances: Here are some available times: Monday at 10 AM, Tuesday at 2 PM. Which time works for you?

nodes.label: confirm_availability
utterances: I have scheduled your appointment on {appointment_time}. Is this correct?

nodes.label: contact_info
utterances: Please provide your contact information.

nodes.label: confirmation
utterances: Your appointment is confirmed. Is there anything else I can help you with?

nodes.label: appointment_done
utterances: Thank you! Your appointment has been successfully scheduled.

nodes.label: cancel_appointment
utterances: I'm sorry to hear you want to cancel. Please confirm if you'd like to cancel your appointment.

nodes.label: reschedule_loop
utterances: Sure, let's reschedule your appointment. Please provide a new preferred time.

nodes.label: follow_up_services
utterances: Would you be interested in any follow-up services after your appointment?

utterances: I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand that. Could you please clarify?

nodes.label: intro_university
utterances: Welcome to the University Admissions Assistant. How may I help you with your university enrollment application today?
Hello! I'm here to assist you with your university admissions process. How can I assist you today?

nodes.label: program_select
utterances: Please select the program you are interested in.
Which program would you like to apply for?

nodes.label: entry_level
utterances: What is your intended entry level?
Please specify your entry level.

nodes.label: requirements
utterances: Here are the application requirements.
Please review the necessary requirements for your application.

nodes.label: document_upload
utterances: Please upload the required documents.
You can now upload your documents.

nodes.label: payment_fees
utterances: Proceed to payment processing.
Let's handle the payment of your application fees.

nodes.label: eligibility_check
utterances: Checking your eligibility.
Please wait while we verify your eligibility.

nodes.label: offer_letter
utterances: Congratulations! You have been accepted.
We are pleased to offer you admission to the program.

nodes.label: no_eligibility
utterances: Unfortunately, you do not meet the eligibility criteria.
We're sorry, but you are not eligible for admission at this time.

nodes.label: confirmation
utterances: Do you confirm your admission?
Please confirm your acceptance of the admission offer.

nodes.label: scholarship_inquiry
utterances: How can I assist you with scholarships?
Would you like information on available scholarships?

nodes.label: aid_process
utterances: Let's fill out your financial aid information.
Please provide details for your financial aid application.

nodes.label: explore_other_options
utterances: Would you like to explore alternative programs?
Shall we look into other available options for you?

nodes.label: info_loop
utterances: Is there anything else I can help you with?
Do you need further assistance with your application?

nodes.label: Culture Greeting
utterances: Hi there! Let's explore some amazing cultures and traditions from around the world. What region or country are you interested in today?
Hello! I'm excited to chat about different cultures and their unique traditions. Which region or country would you like to dive into?

nodes.label: Region Focus
utterances: Great choice! Which cultural aspect would you like to learn about first: festivals, food traditions, language, or cultural challenges?
Awesome! What would you like to explore about this region? We can talk about festivals, food, language, or any cultural challenges you’re curious about.

nodes.label: Festivals Dive
utterances: Festivals are a vibrant part of any culture! Are you curious about any particular festival?
Let's talk festivals! Which celebration would you like to know more about?

nodes.label: Food Traditions
utterances: Food is a wonderful window into culture. Would you like to discuss traditional meals or dining etiquette?
Let's explore food traditions! Are you interested in traditional recipes or how people dine in this culture?

nodes.label: Language Aspect
utterances: Language shapes so much of a culture. Would you like to explore dialects, writing systems, or language families?
Let's delve into language aspects! Are you interested in learning about dialects, writing, or the origins of the language?

nodes.label: Cultural Challenges
utterances: Navigating cultural differences can be tricky. Have you encountered any challenges or need tips on adapting?
Cultural challenges are common. Would you like to discuss dealing with culture shock or adapting to new customs?

nodes.label: Wrap Up
utterances: It's been great exploring cultures with you! Is there anything else you'd like to discuss?
I hope you enjoyed our cultural journey. Would you like to talk about something else or wrap up?

nodes.label: Farewell
utterances: Thanks for chatting! Have a wonderful day exploring more cultures on your own.
It was nice talking with you! Feel free to come back anytime to learn more about different cultures.
I'm interested in Japan.
Let's talk about Italy.
I'd like to learn about Brazil.
Let's discuss festivals.
Tell me about festivals.
I'd like to know about cultural celebrations.
Tell me about food traditions.
I'm interested in traditional meals.
Let's talk about dining etiquette.
Let's explore language aspects.
Tell me about dialects.
I'm curious about the writing system.
Discuss cultural challenges.
What are some cultural differences?
Tell me about adapting to new customs.
That's all for festivals.
I don't want to discuss more festivals.
Let's move on.
That's enough about food.
I don't want to talk more about food.
Let's change the topic.
That's all for language.
I don't want to discuss more language aspects.
Let's move on.
That's enough about cultural challenges.
I don't want to talk more about challenges.
Let's wrap up.
Yes, let's wrap up.
No, that's all for now.
Sure, let's end the conversation.

nodes.label: music_intro
utterances: Hey there! Let's dive into your music composition journey. What genre are you working on?
Hi! I'm excited to discuss your approach to making music. Which genre are you focusing on?

nodes.label: genre_focus
utterances: Great choice with the {genre}! What instruments are you planning to use?
Awesome genre! Let's talk about the instrumentation you're considering.

nodes.label: instrumentation
utterances: Nice selection of instruments. How do you approach writing lyrics?
Interesting instrumentation! Let's discuss your lyric-writing process.

nodes.label: lyric_discussion
utterances: Got it. How do you structure your songs?
Cool lyrics! Let's move on to song structure. How do you typically organize your tracks?

nodes.label: song_structure
utterances: A {song_structure} structure is effective. Do you collaborate with others or work solo?
Using a {song_structure} structure sounds great. How do you handle collaboration?

nodes.label: collaboration
utterances: Collaboration can be really rewarding. What production tools are you using?
Working with others is awesome! Let's talk about the production tools you prefer.

nodes.label: production_tools
utterances: Using {production_tools} is a solid choice. What challenges are you facing in your process?
Nice tools! What kind of challenges have you encountered while producing your music?

nodes.label: challenge_discussion
utterances: Those are common challenges. Would you like some advice on overcoming them?
I understand those can be tough. Do you need any tips to help with these issues?

nodes.label: advice_loop
utterances: Sure, here's some advice to help you out. Anything else you'd like to discuss?
I'd be happy to help! Let me know if you need more tips or want to explore another topic.

nodes.label: end_discussion
utterances: It was great discussing your music composition process. Happy creating!
Thanks for sharing your approach to songwriting. Best of luck with your music!

nodes.label: loop_topics
utterances: Sure, which topic would you like to revisit?
Of course! Let me know which area you'd like to discuss again.
start_discussion
specify_genre
specify_instrumentation
discuss_lyrics
discuss_song_structure
collaborate
specify_production_tools
discuss_challenges
request_advice
end_conversation
loop_topics
specify_genre

utterances: specify_instrumentation
edges.label: revisit_instrumentation

utterances: discuss_lyrics
edges.label: revisit_lyric_discussion

nodes.label: movie_intro
utterances: Hello! Welcome to the Movie Critique Chat. What would you like to discuss today?
Hi there! Let's dive into some movie discussions. Which aspect interests you?

nodes.label: genre_pick
utterances: Great choice! Which genre would you like to explore?
Sure thing! What genre are you interested in discussing?

nodes.label: director_focus
utterances: Let's talk about the director. What are your thoughts on their style?
Sure, which director would you like to analyze?

nodes.label: plot_analysis
utterances: Analyzing the plot. What intrigued you the most?
Let's delve into the plot. Any specific points you want to discuss?

nodes.label: character_dev
utterances: Discussing character development. Which character stood out to you?
Let's talk about the characters. Who did you find most compelling?

nodes.label: cinematography
utterances: Cinematography is key. What did you think of the visual aspects?
Let's explore the cinematography. Any particular scenes you liked?

nodes.label: soundtrack
utterances: The soundtrack adds so much. How did you feel about the music?
Let's discuss the soundtrack. Any favorite tracks?

nodes.label: critic_rating
utterances: Considering the critic ratings, what's your take?
Let's look at the critic ratings. Do you agree with them?

nodes.label: compare_films
utterances: Comparing films can be insightful. Which movies are you interested in?
Let's compare films. Any specific titles in mind?

nodes.label: topic_loop
utterances: Would you like to revisit any topic or choose a new one?
Do you want to discuss another aspect or continue with the current one?

nodes.label: close_chat
utterances: Thank you for the discussion! Feel free to reach out anytime.
It was great talking about movies with you. Have a wonderful day!

nodes.label: gaming_hello
utterances: Hey there! Ready to talk about all things gaming?
Hello! Let's dive into the gaming world together.

nodes.label: platform_choice
utterances: What's your favorite gaming platform? PC, console, or something else?
Which platform do you prefer for gaming?

nodes.label: genre_discussion
utterances: What's your favorite game genre?
Which genre do you enjoy the most in gaming?

nodes.label: favorite_title
utterances: So, what's your all-time favorite game?
What's the game you keep coming back to?

nodes.label: end_chat
utterances: It was great chatting with you! Enjoy your gaming sessions!
Thanks for the talk! Happy gaming!

nodes.label: strategy_tips
utterances: Looking for some strategy tips? Let me know which game you're focusing on.
Need any strategies to up your game? I'm here to help!

nodes.label: multiplayer_vs_single
utterances: Do you prefer multiplayer or single-player games?
Are you more into playing with others or solo gaming?

nodes.label: community_interaction
utterances: Are you active in any gaming communities or forums?
Do you participate in any gaming groups or online communities?

nodes.label: tech_specs
utterances: Let's talk about your gaming setup. What hardware are you using?
What kind of hardware do you have for gaming?

nodes.label: wishlist_future
utterances: What upcoming games are you most excited about?
Which future titles are you looking forward to?

nodes.label: gear_talk
utterances: What gaming gear do you swear by? Any must-have accessories?
Which accessories are essential for your gaming setup?

nodes.label: topic_return
utterances: Sure, we can talk about something else. What would you like to discuss?
No problem! Let me know which topic interests you.

nodes.label: fantasy_start
utterances: Welcome to the Fantasy World Builder! How would you like to start?
Hello! Ready to create your own fantasy world? What would you like to do first?

nodes.label: world_building
utterances: What kind of fantasy world intrigues you? Medieval, steampunk, or high-magic?
Let's outline the setting: ancient kingdom, space-fantasy, or mystical forest?
We can shape a realm. Any starting concept in mind—elves, dragons, or clockwork robots?

nodes.label: character_creation
utterances: Who is our protagonist—knight, mage, rogue, or something else?
Want to design a unique hero or a band of adventurers?
Shall we outline a solitary warrior, or a party of misfits with special skills?

nodes.label: magic_system
utterances: Is magic abundant or rare? Are there any costs or risks to using it?
We can define if spells require components, incantations, or inherent power.
How structured is magic? Rigidly studied or wild and chaotic?

nodes.label: quest_discussion
utterances: What sparks our hero’s journey—an evil overlord, a lost relic, or political intrigue?
Shall we create a grand quest or smaller episodic adventures?
Any plot catalysts you envision for this fantasy story?

nodes.label: villain_creation
utterances: Every quest needs opposition. Who’s the antagonist—dark sorcerer, cunning warlord, or cursed deity?
Is the villain sympathetic or purely evil? Motivations matter.
Let’s craft a memorable villain. Cruel tyrant or tragic antihero?

nodes.label: factions_and_lore
utterances: Are there different kingdoms or guilds with unique goals?
We can add factions: thieves’ guilds, knightly orders, or merchant clans. Thoughts?
Would politics or alliances be a big factor in this world?

nodes.label: side_stories
utterances: Shall we add side quests or subplots, like a dragon’s curse or a haunted forest?
We can create personal arcs for supporting characters. Interested?
Any secondary storyline to enrich the world?

nodes.label: lore_loop
utterances: Would you like to expand on the lore further?
Do you want to delve deeper into the world's history or traditions?
Shall we add more details to the existing lore?

nodes.label: role_play_loop
utterances: We can continue expanding this story or role-play scenarios. Ready?
Want to delve deeper into a specific story arc or keep building the setting?
Shall we role-play as the hero or NPCs, or refine the lore more?

nodes.label: end_fantasy
utterances: Great job on building your fantasy world! Anything else you'd like to add?
Your fantasy world is taking shape beautifully. Ready to conclude?
We've made significant progress on your story. Shall we wrap up for now?

Let's start with world building.

Let's start with character creation.
